body:
Comment 2: 
diff -r 5e806355a9e1 src/cmd/gc/const.c
--- a/src/cmd/gc/const.c        Thu Jun 14 12:50:42 2012 +1000
+++ b/src/cmd/gc/const.c        Thu Jun 21 14:58:06 2012 +0800
@@ -1013,6 +1013,7 @@
                n->type = t;
                return;
        case ONOT:
+       case OCOM:
                defaultlit(&n->left, t);
                n->type = n->left->type;
                return;
